医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
发现与厌恶和抑郁有关的神经回路研究人员发现大脑中有一种新的神经回路，当激活时会产生强烈的不适感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Neural- Circuit-linked-to-aversion-and-depression-discovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Neural- Circuit-linked-to-aversion-and-depression-discovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81c6d848-ee4d-4009-b9e5-19f15b402df8 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 19:57:49 -0500 Neural circuit linked to aversion and depression discovered
可穿戴技术有助于改善农业工作条件AgWearCare 项目利用可穿戴设备来收集数据并将其数字化，支持农业任务并预防与工作相关的肌肉骨骼疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Wearable-technology-helps-to-improve-working-conditions-in-agriculture.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Wearable-technology-helps-to-improve-working-conditions-in-agriculture.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc19464b-a453-4616-a07e-1ed3f6e462a2 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 19:40:00 -0500 Wearable technology helps to improve working conditions in agriculture
Telomouse模型为深入的衰老和癌症研究提供了宝贵的资源研究人员介绍了“Telomouse”。通过对标准实验室小鼠进行微妙的基因改变，他们使保护染色体末端的端粒与人类的端粒更加相似。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Telomouse-model-provides-a-valuable-resource-for-in-depth-aging-and-cancer-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Telomouse-model-provides-a-valuable-resource-for-in-depth-aging-and-cancer-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b75228ff-9716-4361-8855-6422b1796e95 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 19:33:32 -0500 Telomouse model provides a valuable resource for in-depth aging and cancer research
青少年后期的高 BMI 与晚年罹患 17 种不同癌症的风险较高有关18 岁时超重或肥胖的男性在以后的生活中患 17 种不同癌症的风险更高。哥德堡大学的一项研究表明了这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/High-BMI-in-late-teens-linked-to-higher-risk-of-17- Different-cancers-later-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/High-BMI-in-late-teens-linked-to-higher-risk-of-17- Different-cancers-later-in-life.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e378325-2a0e-4b1f-b782-0bc9c54b8fb0 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 19:25:00 -0500 High BMI in late teens linked to higher risk of 17 different cancers later in life
CEPI 和牛津大学启动新项目，启动针对胡宁病毒的疫苗开发流行病防范创新联盟 (CEPI) 和牛津大学今天宣布启动一个新项目，启动针对胡宁病毒原型疫苗的早期开发，胡宁病毒被选为沙粒病毒家族的一个范例，该家族负责多种致命的出血热具有流行和大流行的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/CEPI-and-University-of-Oxford-launch-new-project-to-initiate-vaccine-development-against-Junin-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/CEPI-and-University-of-Oxford-launch-new-project-to-initiate-vaccine-development-against-Junin-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1708d87e-a44f-457f-be58-597325453d5c Mon, 06 Nov 2023 19:16:58 -0500 CEPI and University of Oxford launch new project to initiate vaccine development against Junín virus
纽约大学朗格健康中心连续第七次获得 Leapfrog 最高安全评级NYU Langone Health 连续第七次在整个系统的住院地点获得最高安全评级，每个住院地点在 2023 年秋季 Leapfrog 医院安全等级发布中均获得“A”评级，患者安全水平仅比其他医院高 30 分占全国医院的百分比。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/NYU-Langone-Health-earns-Leapfrogs-top-safety- ratings-for-the-seventh-time-in-a-row.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/NYU-Langone-Health-earns-Leapfrogs-top-safety- ratings-for-the-seventh-time-in-a-row.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8953e54f-2cf1-4293-9c62-c52d30a73699 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 12:20:02 -0500 NYU Langone Health earns Leapfrog's top safety ratings for the seventh time in a row
使医疗保健系统更具可持续性的实用技巧减少医院中的一氧化二氮废物，改用可重复使用的阴道窥器进行宫颈筛查，以及开药片而不是静脉注射药物，这些只是医生可以采取的减少医疗保健碳足迹的一些切实行动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Practical-tips-for-making-healthcare-systems-more-sustainable.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Practical-tips-for-making-healthcare-systems-more-sustainable.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25379a6c-862d-44e2-8af5-13e978fed228 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 12:12:56 -0500 Practical tips for making healthcare systems more sustainable
科学家开发出组织粘合明胶水凝胶以加速伤口愈合、预防感染开放性伤口，无论是由事故还是手术等医疗程序引起的，都需要适当的处理以加速愈合并预防感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Scientists-develop-tissue-adhesive-gelatin-hydrogels-to-speed-up-wound-healing-prevent-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Scientists-develop-tissue-adhesive-gelatin-hydrogels-to-speed-up-wound-healing-prevent-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04c0a28c-cf76-4d14-b591-9877801dfc60 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 12:09:23 -0500 Scientists develop tissue adhesive gelatin hydrogels to speed up wound healing, prevent infections
研究显示英国假肢和矫形器劳动力严重短缺斯塔福德郡大学的一项研究显示，英国的假肢师、矫形师、假肢和矫形技术人员以及支持人员的数量严重不足。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Study-reveals-significant-deficit-in-the-UKs-prosthetic-and-orthotic-workforce.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Study-reveals-significant-deficit-in-the-UKs-prosthetic-and-orthotic-workforce.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=971d2f12-ae82-44fa-85ae-a67ce92defce Mon, 06 Nov 2023 12:03:27 -0500
慢性疲劳综合症患者受益于认知行为疗法阿姆斯特丹 UMC 和伦敦国王学院的研究人员表明，认知行为疗法 (CBT) 对 ME/CFS 患者有益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Patients-with-chronic-fatigue-syndrome-benefit-from-cognitive-behavior-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Patients-with-chronic-fatigue-syndrome-benefit-from-cognitive-behavior-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6a6c14d-7a45-4647-85b9-a57b44c0dd80 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 11:57:37 -0500 Patients with chronic fatigue syndrome benefit from cognitive behavior therapy
